description: Financial Institution Transfer for its Own Account

scenarios.name: Nostro Account Funding
scenarios.description: Funding transfers to nostro accounts at correspondent banks

scenarios.name: Liquidity Management Transfer
scenarios.description: Internal liquidity transfers between branches or entities

usage_notes: MT200 is used exclusively for transfers where the financial institution acts for its own account
Not to be used for customer-initiated transfers
No specific network validation rules apply to MT200
